definitions.text: a deliberately invalid argument displaying ingenuity in reasoning in the hope of deceiving someone
being expert or having knowledge of some technical subject
examples: understanding affine transformations requires considerable mathematical sophistication

definitions.text: the quality or character of being intellectually sophisticated and worldly through cultivation or experience or disillusionment
falsification by the use of sophistry; misleading by means of specious fallacies
examples: he practiced the art of sophistication upon reason
